name: kolektrash-deployment
description: Deployment and version management scripts for KolekTrash

scripts.deploy:staging: echo 'Deploying to staging...' && git checkout development && git pull origin development
scripts.deploy:production: echo 'Deploying to production...' && git checkout main && git pull origin main
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push origin main --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push origin main --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push origin main --tags
scripts.backup:create: git checkout -b backup-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && git push origin backup-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)
scripts.rollback:safe: git checkout main && git log --oneline -5 && echo 'Use: git reset --hard <commit-hash>'
scripts.status:check: git status && echo '--- Recent Commits ---' && git log --oneline -5
